PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05412022-05-19JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActTax Court of Canada Act
SubjectCommissioners for Administering Oaths ** Tax Court of Canada **
PrecisOrder directing that COMMISSIONS do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering 11 officers of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the TAX COURT OF CANADA.
AttachmentsAttachment
